summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 35pcs Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit ADIMANIS Eyebrow Powder One Step Brow Stamp and Shaping Kit Eyebrow Stencils Eyebrows Shape Reusable Eyebrow Brush, Hairline Powder Contouring Stick (Light Brown)
Review Date: 2022/02/18
Store: ADIMANIS
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ADIMANIS', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable, Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 4.13 x 1.65 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '761325190127'}
Review Text: All the stencils and the purple t shape stencils are not long enough for my brows but otherwise work as described. The powder does not. Can't get enough powder on the presser to do any good. Doesn't show up well and not enough powder to really transfer or even do 1 brow without repressing the powder multiple times. I use the stencils with another kit. The powder and powder applicator are a joke
Review Title: Powder didn't work at all
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Multi-Purpose Electric Massage Gel & Oil Warmer, Wax Melter, Includes Aluminum Warming Pot (16.9 fl oz), Knob Dial To Adjust Temperature (95F to 257F), With LCD Screen
Review Date: 2022/02/22
Store: EROTICGEL
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 7.72 x 7.6 inches; 1.77 Pounds', 'UPC': '754590183604'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:c9f78d09ec648d2bdc92f5ad9698e698]] The look of this is very modern and I like that you can see an actual degree not just high, medium, low. The soft wax pots from my old warmer have a lot of space on the sides even with the removable insert, but it still heats and melted them nicely.  My problem comes with the shape of the warmer.  I scrape the side of the stick that I'm not using on the edge of the pot to conserve my wax and the round shape makes it tip if I do this too hard.  It only comes with the warmer and the removable pot.  To not come with any more than that i feel like $50 is kind of steep.  (At the time of writing this $39.99 which is more reasonable.  The bottom glows red or green letting you know if your wax is up to temp. Its nice and looks nice, but not great for my usage.
Review Title: Looks great but not practical for me
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Earfodo Long Blonde Wigs for Women Ombre Dirty Blonde Wig with Bangs Middle Part Heat Resistant Layered Synthetic Wig For Women Daily Party Wear 21 Inch Natural Looking
Review Date: 2022/03/07
Store: Earfodo
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'Earfodo', 'Cartoon Character': 'American', 'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 7.32 x 2.56 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: The color on this is gorgeous, but it has a lot of issues.  The bangs are hard to get right.  They don't really part in a specific place and just want to hang forward.  The lengths of the bangs and layers are made for a longer face.  The longer layers have way more on one side than the other and both sides point in the same direction.  (Makes a "C" shape around the face) also even after paying it and pulling it forward the side hairs hang away from the face when you lean.  So much that you can see the line of the wig and my hairline.  The cap is so big that even with a wig cap and 3 clips this keeps pulling back so much it shows inches of my hairline.  I wish this was better because I really like this blonde, but this wig is not for me
Review Title: Beautiful color but cap is huge and style is crooked
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vegan Mia - USDA Organic Radiance Superfruit Cleansing Oil and Make-up Remover, Oil Cleanser and Makeup Remover Oil for Dry Skin and Other Skin Types, Loaded with Moisturizer Essential Fatty Acids, Rich in Antioxidants, Truly Natural Skincare, (With No Added Fragrance) 3.4 fl oz
Review Date: 2022/03/15
Store: Vegan Mia
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vegan Mia', 'Scent': 'Natural aroma of fruit oils - No fragrance added', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 1.77 x 1.73 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '762530483363', 'Manufacturer': 'Vegan Mia'}
Review Text: I do not recommend this at all. It smells absolutely terrible. Leaves a thick greasy film on your skin that's hard to get off.  Smells like vegetable or olive oil.  More like something you'd cook with than put on your skin. Does remove the makeup but at the cost of smelling like a fry cook. Sorry but gross
Review Title: Smells like cooking oil. Leaves grease on face
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mocossmy Cross Nail Art Charms Decoration,72 PCS Gold Silver 3D Mini Metal Punk Vintage Cross Designs Mixed Types Retro Acrylic Nail Jewelry Accessories for Women Girls DIY Manicure Crafts Decoration
Review Date: 2022/05/13
Store: Mocossmy
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {}
Review Text: these are SOO much nicer than I expected.  I almost feel like they're too nice to waste on my nails. (im a biter and they get torn up with my job so they don't last long for me) These are real metal, some with inlaid jewels. I love the heave metal slightly aged look. silver and gold/Bronze pack. slight curve to the back so they fit the curve of the nail nicely. (especially helps with larger trinkets, if not they will stick up from the nail toward the sides and leave a gap that has to be filled in) These don't do that. super nice! highly recommend
Review Title: SO nice! real metal!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Cfalaicos Women Short Curly Bob Wavy Wig for Cosplay Party Halloween Heat Resistant Wigs Full Head Wig with Free Wig Cap (Rainbow)
Review Date: 2022/06/13
Store: Cfalaicos
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '14 x 10 x 10 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'Cfalaicos', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '14 x 10 x 10 inches; 7.05 Ounces'}
Review Text: The colors were only so-so and the cut and the part are off. I wanted to like this way more than I actually do. 😕
Review Title: Wanted to like this more than i did
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: U Beauty Preface Kit | Skin Care Gift Value Set with Retinol, Vitamin C Serum Anti-Aging Essentials Skin Tightening Arm Cream + Facial Hyaluronic Acid Morning and Night - 2.7oz (Set of 3)
Review Date: 2022/06/15
Store: U Beauty
Product Description: ['Our three cult-favorite hero products in an exclusive getaway-ready kit: The essential Travel Trio features the Resurfacing Compound 15ml, SUPER Hydrator 15ml, and SCULPT Arm Compound 50ml.']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Brand': 'U Beauty', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Item Volume': '15 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 4.33 x 7.87 inches; 1.35 Pounds', 'UPC': '850022804137', 'Manufacturer': 'U Beauty', 'Country of Origin': 'Italy'}
Review Text: Nice kit,  full size bottles. arm firming compound has strong rubbing alcohol scent is my only semi-complaint. Otherwise very nice. Large amount, beautiful kit. No strong scent to the moisturizers or the arm compound after the alcohol scent evaporates.
Review Title: Full size bottles
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: HMPRT 80s Costumes for Men, Halloween Heavy Metal Rocker Wig with Trucker Hat, Black T-Shirt Outfit, 90s Accessories Blow Up Guitar Music Costume Prop,L
Review Date: 2022/07/22
Store: HMPRT
Product Description: ['5Pcs Halloween 80s costume include:one 80s hatone 80s mullet wigone 80s black shirtone 80s guitarone wig cap. What you see is what you get.']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '0.79 x 0.79 x 0.79 inches; 1.08 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'HM-WayneSet-L', 'Department': 'Men', 'Manufacturer': 'HMPRT'}
Review Text: Impressed by everything in this costume set.  The black tee is thick cotton material and a real shirt.  Fully finished off as is the hat. I wear hats frequently and this Wayne's world one has made it into my regular daily wear caps.  The blow up guitar,  literally air guitar, is still blown up in my kids room.  Couldn't buy all these pieces separately for the price.  Would recommend.  Super happy with everything
Review Title: Sweet deal! Good quality
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user reported several positive experiences, particularly enjoying the quality and aesthetics of specific items. The electric warmer was appreciated for its modern appearance and effective heating capabilities. The nail art charms received high praise for their unexpected quality, being described as nicer than anticipated and made of real metal, which added to their appeal. Additionally, the user found the skincare gift set appealing due to its full-size products and overall presentation. The Halloween costume set exceeded expectations regarding quality and functionality, with components that were well-constructed and practical.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
The user had notable negative experiences with multiple products. The eyebrow kit was criticized for the lack of powder and ineffectiveness of the stencils, leading to dissatisfaction. Similarly, the cleansing oil was found to have an unpleasant smell and left a greasy residue, detracting from its usability. The wig purchased exhibited numerous fit and styling issues, leaving the user frustrated due to its inability to sit properly or look natural. Overall, there were consistent complaints regarding certain items failing to meet expectations or requirements.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experience reveals a mixed bag of satisfaction. Positive sentiments were noted for the aesthetics and quality of certain items, especially in beauty and costume purchases. However, significant dissatisfaction was expressed regarding specific products that failed to perform as expected or had practical limitations. This indicates a need for careful selection to ensure product effectiveness, particularly in beauty and personal care items, juxtaposed with successful purchases in decorative and functional categories.

target_interaction.title: Lots of product
target_interaction.text: This comes with lots of builder gel. The clear is very clear and does not haze.  Does need to be wiped after to get rid of sticky and comes with small slip solution.  I use to encapsulate decor into nails,  but I do find this a little runout than polygel and needs more slip solution to not stick to the brush. In not a professional and am still working out the kinks. Would recommend.  This is my go to clear for decor or nail builder for my bitten off nails. Huge tubs.  Worth it
target_interaction.title_meta: Builder Gel Nail Kit -2 oz Clear&Pink Nail Extension Gel Big Capacity Builder Gel for Nails,Hard Gel Strengthen Set with Nail Forms Brush Nail File DIY for Nail Art Manicure
